title: Manage Pipeline Pigging Operation
description: An operator schedules and monitors the run of a 'smart pig' (an inline inspection tool) through a pipeline to check for corrosion.

tasks.description: Schedule the pig run in the operations system, notifying all affected parties.
tasks.expected_outcome: The pigging operation is officially scheduled.

tasks.description: Monitor the pig's progress through the pipeline by tracking its location via pig signallers.
tasks.expected_outcome: The operator tracks the pig in real-time as it passes key points.

tasks.description: Confirm the pig has been successfully received at the downstream trap and log the completion of the run.
tasks.expected_outcome: The run is logged as complete, and the inspection data is ready for download.
